summary: This mod is a complete overhaul of Lydia
descriptionHtml:
What does this mod do?
Short version: 
This mod is a complete overhaul of Lydia, it changes her in nearly every way while keeping her relatively similar to the original Lydia. 

Long version:
-Makes her a little faster so she catches up a alot quicker. 
-She is now sexy
-Makes her essential so she cannot die.
-She no longer affects stealth so you can be a ninja without her giving you away.
-Increases her combat efficiency  
-allows her to level to 100
-Upgrades her stamina and Magicka 
-fixes bug where you cant marry her
-added some handy items to her inventory 
-gave her a sexy default outfit
-Muffled movement
-Changes her race 
-Makes her a little bit taller
- More soon
All in one mod!

You need:
ApachiiSkyHair by Apachii - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/10168#content
Temptress by RacePsychos1s and Brokefoot - http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18717#content

How to get it working:
1: Download with manager/Drag data to skyrim installed folder (one that allready has a data folder) and merge files.
2: Check houscard/whiterun in data files.
3: in game press `/Command and type player.placeatme 000a2c8e
4: Lydia should be next to you, ask her to join you.
author: nyanXD
